title: PETRA SOMA — Stone Remembers. We Reveal What It Holds.
description: A luxury stone carving atelier landing page for the fictional brand PETRA SOMA (Body of Stone). Cool granite-black palette with aged bronze and marble-white accents, animated blueprint grid hero canvas that draws itself on load with cross markers at intersections, stone biography cards with geological data and quarry GPS, asymmetric works portfolio grid, three named carver triptych portraits, time transparency section (4–24 month project timescales), selected commission case studies, and invitation-only contact section. Works accepted by invitation, 4–6 per year.
